name:
Red Cat Corps:
Update
description:
An update forYO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS®: Red Cat Corps is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS®: Red Cat Corps should download the update. This will update the software to Version 2.4 with the following amendments:

- Various bug fixes.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
